Name: K72
Title: small
Review: Small monument in a lovely manicured park. It's a lovely restful place to sit and relax. The monument is quite lovely and doesn't take long to view. Much smaller scale and design compared to the Kolkata monument but nice all the same.

Name: Companion32331321681
Title: Visit to victoria memorial kolkatta
Review: 150 year old monument stands majestically in centre of huge gardens and water bodies on all four side. Houses a museum rich in history of british conquests in India and some unique picture galleries of kolkatta of those days. Worth a visit.

Name: niya27
Title: In Begum Hazrat Mahal Park
Review: It is small monument in the Begum Hazrat Mahal Park. No separate ticket to visit this place. It was locked when I visited. I took few photographs from outside.

Name: kushBans
Title: Can't compare
Review: You can't really compare it with Kolkata's memorial but this one is also a good site to visit with your friends or even family.

Name: Nandana1
Title: Historical Building
Review: A beautiful memorial built for Queen Victoria. There is a park attached to it for happily relaxing. The building is built with white marble and looks awesome.

Name: irfan5081
Title: Victoria Memorial
Review: Nice place to hang out with friends specially on bike. And the atmosphere is really good in evening. We had really enjoyed a lot.

Name: Aarav K
Title: Awesome Photo Spot
Review: Coming with friends can be fun here. Beautiful place to take group photos and selfie. I liked this place, Enjoy yourself too.

Name: AsisBandyopadhyay
Title: Victoria Memorial in Lucknow!
Review: Usually Victoria Memorial is an icon of Kolkata. But in the Begum Hazrat Mahal Oark in Lucknow, there is a small structure in white which is name Victoria Memorial. It is not a huge structure and does not have any Hall. But the white structure in the green surroundings looks attractive and the stone work is quite good.

Name: mirzasamir1970
Title: A short visit deserve
Review: Good photo spot, not  for long time... Only some minutes and photoss...nice surroundings and parks... Many couples sit around...

Name: MANISH S
Title: A park for special one
Review: Situated near Parivartan chauraha, Begum Hazrat Mahal Park is a beautiful park with lush greenery and nice ambiance. Not very suitable for outdoor sports but quite good for spending some time with friends and not family. Young couples can be seen in every corner making it somewhat awkward for others. Great place for photography and to relax and chill.

Name: Sabiruz A
Title: Nice place
Review: its nice place for roaming with family.Very clean.My two of friend staying this place.Make shopping also good.

Name: Pallavi S
Title: Nice gardens
Review: At one time Lucknow was known as the city of gardens. Some of the old gardens have survived and this is one of them. Not spectacular anymore but still good to spend a winter morning or a summer evening at.

Name: joshi_rajneesh1
Title: wondering park
Review: this park is the shan of lucknow .....it is in purana lucknow and the hyginic park is best to wonder and and hitorical and also for kinds

Name: Rishabh K
Title: For history lovers...
Review: A very good attraction of Lucknow for history lovers....it is a memorial of Queen victoria and it is very peaceful place

Name: bryan t
Title: Beautifully kept
Review: A beautifully kept memorial and gardens right in the centre of the city. A lovely place for strolling through the grounds

Name: Amber S
Title: park
Review: one of the famous park of lucknow, not clean as desired, people need to keep the place clean it is your property.

Name: uskhushi
Title: beautiful place
Review: histopric park where u can spend time in peace with natural feel of environment ..kind of family park since old times

Name: Vinaytiwari06
Title: Not intresting
Review: Very old park, in evening lot of rush, It 700 m from the Hazarat ganj. Actually, there is nothing to write more about this, you can visit if you spare of time and nothing remain in lucknow

Title: Imagine when the Queen Victoria Monoment was there
Review: During 1960- 70, it was the only best park with the monument of Queen Victoria in spotless white marble, and a very attractive park where all the leading political leaders used to delivered their speeches from  respected Atalji, Jagmohan Lalji and others. I think the best place to play cricket matches and it was  difficult to count how many matches are going on, but everybody loves to visit this park, which  was later known as Begum Hazrat Mehal park , very well maintained, best place for morning walk.

Name: SANDEEP24886
Title: Victorial Memorial - lost in history, finally getting it's due.
Review: Over the years, this memorial has gone through a lot of transition. I remember this place was once used for Ramleela and burning Ravan/Meghnath/Kumbhkaran during Dushhera festival. Then after few years, it witnessed the organizing of Lucknow Mahotsav for few years consecutively. For the past 5-6 years, it has been transformed into a well-maintained park managed by Lucknow Development Authority. The memorial has finally got its due since the memorial dates back to the Fight for Independence of this free India. Not many are aware of the significance that this memorial has, as it has seen the ruthless times of pre-1947 struggle.

Name: bdeveloperinfo
Title: place always remain in your memory
Review: best one from ancient time's memory .it reminds us about old times ,about our forefathers and also for person who fight for our country
